page.title: 17CLUBS
page.content: CLUBS WOMEN'S INSTITUTE-STARTED IN 1944. ACTIVE PARTICIPATION IN VILLAGE AFFAIRS HAS ALWAYS BEEN A FEATURE, WITH FUND-RAISING AND AID TO THE MENTALLY HANDICAPPED AND OTHER WORTHWHILE CAUSES NEAR AND FAR. BRITISH LEGION-BEGUN 1947 RAISES FUNDS AND CARES FOR EX-SERVICE PEOPLE. BOWLS CLUB-BEGUN IN 1959 WITH SECTIONS FOR BOTH MEN AND LADIES.GAMES ARE PLAYED AGAINST VISITING TEAMS. EVERGREEN CLUB -BEGUN IN 1966 FOR PEOPLE OVER 60.THEY ARRANGE AND ENJOY SOCIAL MEETINGS AND OUTINGS. BROWNIES AND GUIDES- STARTED IN 1967 WITH MANY ACTIVITIES INCLUDING WORKING FOR INTEREST BADGES. CUBS AND SCOUTS-1973 SEE BROWNIES. PLAYGROUP 1971-FOR PRE-SCHOOLCHILDREN TUDOR-REEDS 1979-FOR FOLK-DANCING.
